backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two features related to Web3Provider wrapping and error fallback, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source file paths to short functional summaries of each component, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH‑based color variables and light/dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React application root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper adding ThemeProvider, Web3Provider, ErrorBoundary, Dashboard, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Component displaying BNB and token balances with refresh actions and a UI for adding/removing watched token addresses.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Component showing vault contract address, owner, network info, and clipboard/copy actions.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Form for depositing BEP20 tokens, including validation, approval+deposit flow, and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches runtime errors and displays a styled fallback UI with reload and technical details options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar with branding and a theme toggle button using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Handles MetaMask detection, wallet connection, network switching, and mobile/desktop fallback instructions for Web3.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form UI for withdrawing BNB or BEP20 tokens, including validation and calling vault withdrawal hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth client state, login handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because Web3 is used directly instead of backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and formats BNB and token balances from the vault contract, updating when tokens or connection state change.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and tracks the vault owner address from the contract when Web3 is connected.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal helpers that encode contract calls and manage loading state while sending transactions to the vault.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent list of watched token addresses using localStorage with add, remove, and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Implements a Web3 context for MetaMask-based wallet connection, network switching, and contract call/transaction utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with accessibility and mobile tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Contains vault address, function signatures, and helpers to encode and decode contract method calls.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Implements BigInt-based EVM utilities for address validation, encoding/decoding, and unit parsing/formatting without external libraries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard UI with wallet connection, network checks, and tabs for balances, deposits, and withdrawals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the DApp’s goals, requirements, known issues, and features for interacting with a BSC vault contract.
